Imports

nodematch, nodetype, common

Types

AlphabetSym = int32
Closure = HashSet[int16]
DfaRow = Table[AlphabetSym, int32]
DfaClosure = Table[AlphabetSym, int32]
Dfa = object
  table*: seq[DfaRow]
  cs*: seq[Closure]
  closures*: seq[DfaClosure]
